body:
{"text": "Spaghetti and Meatballs

Ingredients:
- 1 pound spaghetti
- 1 pound ground beef
- 1 egg
- 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
- 1 jar marinara sauce

Instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions
2. Mix beef, egg, and breadcrumbs
3. Form meatballs
4. Brown meatballs in pan
5. Add sauce and simmer
6. Serve over pasta"}
